original_text: Thou art my battle axe and weapons of war: for with thee will I break in pieces the nations, and with thee will I destroy kingdoms;
korean_text: 여호와께서 이르시되 너는 나의 철퇴 곧 무기라 나는 네가 나라들을 분쇄하며 네가 국가들을 멸하며

sentences.original_text: for with thee will I break in pieces nations,
sentences.korean_translation: 너와 함께 내가 나라들을 산산조각 낼 것이니

sentences.original_text: and with thee will I destroy kingdoms;
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너와 함께 내가 왕국들을 멸망시킬 것이다
